lead_paragraph: The Nashville Predators frustrated Joe Pavelski and San Jose's top line for much of the night, forcing turnovers, blocking shots and limiting chances.

headline.print_headline: Pavelski's Late Goal Gives Sharks 3-2 Win Over Predators
headline.main: Pavelski's Late Goal Gives Sharks 3-2 Win Over Predators
